channel.title: [317] Help With Commands In Client.java [317]
channel.description:
Ok... so i did this before... i posted something related to this... about adding 2 people to the commands in client.java , The source im using is Runeworld. And if you know there is more commands to switch your name to them... I wanna know how to add 3 people to the list...
Heres what it looks like with 2:
[code]if (command.startsWith("xteleall") && ((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Lunar")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Homework"))))[/code]
If anyone can help please post a comment. :D Thanks!

item.title: [317] Help With Commands In Client.java [317]
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

[quote=“Rigsy, post:1, topic:374224”]Ok… so i did this before… i posted something related to this… about adding 2 people to the commands in client.java , The source im using is Runeworld. And if you know there is more commands to switch your name to them… I wanna know how to add 3 people to the list…

Heres what it looks like with 2:

if (command.startsWith("xteleall") && ((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Lunar")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Homework"))))

If anyone can help please post a comment.
Thanks![/quote][quote=“Bandos K0, post:2, topic:374224”]if (command.startsWith(“xteleall”) && ((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ChangeToYourName”)) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ChangeToNameYouWant” )) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ChangeToNameYouWant” ))))))

This Should work… If not take off 2 )'s at the end of this code

Hope this works! :D[/quote]

that should work

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Help With Commands In Client.java [317]
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_K0 Bandos K0
item.description:
@Bandos_K0 wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“xteleall”) && ((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ChangeToYourName”)) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ChangeToNameYouWant” )) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ChangeToNameYouWant” ))))))

This Should work… If not take off 2 )'s at the end of this code

Hope this works!

Read full topic
